sentences.en: A new exhibition signals the end of postmodernism.
sentences.cn: 一场新展览会标志着后现代主义的终结。

sentences.en: The author is not endorsing any kind of fashionable postmodernism here.
sentences.cn: 作者其实并不是赞同任何形式的时髦的后现代主义。

sentences.en: I'm not so interested in postmodernism, rather more in classical literature.
sentences.cn: 我对后现代主义不是那么感兴趣，相反我更喜欢古典文学。
